text: Jusman Syafii Djamal (Born in Langsa, East Aceh, Aceh, Indonesia July 28, 1954, aged 63 years) is the former Minister of Transportation of Indonesia, serving between 2007 and 2009.Mahmud, Fachri. "EU, Indonesia cooperate on air safety." Jakarta Post. Friday 29 February 2009. Retrieved on 11 February 2009. ==References== Category:1954 births Category:Bandung Institute of Technology alumni Category:Transport ministers of Indonesia Category:Living people Category:People from Langsa
title: Jusman Syafii Djamal
